h1. xmlFolderData

Stores project data in XML files in a folder.  

h2. Configuration Elements

|| Element || Description || Type || Required || Default || Version ||
| base | The base folder to store the XML in.  \\If this is not an absolute folder then it will be rooted in the project's artefacts folder.   | String | No | snapshots | 1.6 |
| snapshot | The folder to store snapshots.  \\If this is not an absolute folder then it will be relative to the base folder.   | String | No | snapshots | 1.6 |
